scripts.predeploy: npm run build:neocity && npm run build:spiritbound && npm run build:poke && npm run build:iron-fist && npm run build:undertale && npm run build:blind-timer && npm run build:do-not-press && npm run build:dont-smile && npm run build:petty-court && npm run build:voice-copter && npm run build:blank-judge && npm run build
scripts.build:neocity: cd neocity-architect && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../public/neocity-architect && cp -R dist/* ../public/neocity-architect/
scripts.build:spiritbound: cd spiritbound && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../public/spiritbound && cp -R dist/* ../public/spiritbound/
scripts.build:poke: cd poke-pixel && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../public/poke-pixel && cp -R dist/* ../public/poke-pixel/
scripts.build:iron-fist: cd iron-fist && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../public/iron-fist && cp -R dist/* ../public/iron-fist/
scripts.build:undertale: cd undertale && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:blind-timer: cd blind-timer && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:do-not-press: cd do-not-press && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:dont-smile: cd dont-smile-challenge && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:petty-court: cd petty-court && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:voice-copter: cd voice-copter && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:blank-judge: cd blank-judge && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p ../public/blank-judge && cp -R dist/* ../public/blank-judge/
